name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"8782fe95-4246-46b0-9b0b-e1fd61026e36","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":1,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Group: Definitions & Structure","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0bc4380e-7b58-4671-89a3-75b21eff1218","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description:
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"These methods focus on ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"declaring","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":" code entities. They analyze how functions, classes, and arguments are defined, constructing the "skeleton" of the program before analyzing the logic inside them.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b616642a-24a2-4bee-8970-4ec2610d1f0b","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This group handles the transition from "using" variables to "defining" them. When the analyzer encounters a class or function definition, it's not just running code—it's creating new scopes, establishing inheritance hierarchies, defining method signatures, and processing decorators. These methods ensure that the analyzer understands the shape and interface of the code components.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"bfa41de2-7bd8-4e54-8046-c5d0f42728e3","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"b5ae2bd8-3be9-48b2-91e0-f40bbd976a2d","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function Descriptions","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4124fc25-3fed-4722-aba7-bc63b6a88809","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"visit_ClassDef","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3f8e78b0-f96c-40fc-b996-da51fa8b73fa","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description:
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Processes class definitions in the code. Tracks class inheritance, methods, and class-level variables.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"946f61d5-dfc0-4e9e-b789-80c8a8ce3da8","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Internal Logic:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"acb0d384-4689-44ae-829b-13b453b3251d","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Scope Creation:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Generates a new unique namespace for the class (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"module.ClassName","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") and creates a corresponding scope.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"26edac1a-5163-4fa9-9f48-7c59d1a0d86a","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Special Member Handling:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Automatically adds definitions for ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"self","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"<return>","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" within the class scope to track instance variables and instantiation types.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"db4e0762-9c31-4870-9344-dac4d93ab56e","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Inheritance Resolution:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Iterates through the base classes (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"node.bases","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"). It resolves these references to find the parent definitions and updates the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ClassManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to track the Method Resolution Order (MRO). This ensures that looking up a method on a child class correctly finds it in the parent.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6de841c5-47a7-46fe-bf34-37885ef18422","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Body Processing:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Pushes the class definition onto the stack and recursively visits the body (methods, assignments) to populate the class scope.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"690e55b4-2732-4140-839b-fff9035c1d6e","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"visit_FunctionDef","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4f5cf630-cc1c-439a-972a-141eab69da0c","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description:
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Analyzes synchronous function definitions (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"def my_func():","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1127d6a8-5eda-4892-bffc-9fec6f5f37b2","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Internal Logic:
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"This method acts as a wrapper for the shared logic found in ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"_handle_function_def","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". It ensures the function name is added to the current scope, handles decorators (processing them as function calls), and recursively visits the function body.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8be3594e-e250-4cbf-abc6-88a671ff36d8","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"visit_AsyncFunctionDef","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"10663b71-e96a-4f2c-9216-b56c9156334e","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description:
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Analyzes asynchronous function definitions (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"async def my_func():","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9ca1006d-57cd-439f-9416-a750dd335212","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Internal Logic:
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Identical to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"visit_FunctionDef","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", this method handles the slightly different AST node type for async functions but delegates to the same underlying logic.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"36df4f00-6efb-4c65-9c19-200bfef32dd0","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"visit_Lambda","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"79634d78-5a6f-4ccd-945e-598e6cb3f4e6","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description:
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Processes lambda (anonymous) functions (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"lambda x: x + 1","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c624b982-6aac-4a5f-a850-6881e08e0c63","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Internal Logic:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"55259b41-c046-426d-9b80-93f4f4fb891c","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Naming:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Since lambdas are anonymous, it generates a unique name based on a counter (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"<lambda_1>","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"809977f8-6a5d-4bcb-b3ce-e7237fbebf74","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Scope:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Creates a new temporary scope for the lambda body.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"45e0c8f5-a258-4053-adb7-9ac90d4993b7","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Delegation:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" calls ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"_handle_function_def","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to process arguments and the body expression just like a regular function.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"74c39fa5-6e4f-4a97-8362-b253b1ec21f7","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"_handle_function_def","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"fe1e1692-9f19-45b1-a9ca-f05a96e64e05","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description:
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The core logic engine for all function types. It processes parameters, decorators, and function body analysis.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5891897c-28a5-4f8e-8d73-dc448da0fe47","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Internal Logic:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"bb88901c-b54d-40da-855e-c838e29bebd8","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Definition Creation:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Creates the formal definition object for the function.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"30f83d4c-cdf0-40ad-a939-3e0fd9c1d60a","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Default Arguments:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Extracts default values (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"def foo(a=1)","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") using ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"_get_fun_defaults","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b9ff6076-f045-4b10-bd9f-8d71b3350491","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Parameter Processing:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"cb12e7d1-2224-4dad-9a69-9f841cec44e7","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It handles standard arguments, keyword-only arguments, and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"*args","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"/","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"**kwargs","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"198b3c13-6d3f-46da-b6a3-efdaa4c329ee","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It creates local definitions for these parameters inside the function's scope.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7006bad8-3d55-468b-ba83-eb8b30583d7f","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It handles the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"self","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" parameter in class methods, often creating a link back to the class instance to support attribute lookup (e.g., knowing that ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"self.x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" refers to a class member).","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"e00f602c-9030-40e7-a0b9-db4666062bf9","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"_handle_args","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4b48ac11-2589-4671-828c-abb4585926ec","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description:
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Processes function arguments and parameters during a function ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"call","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (not definition). Extracts information about positional, keyword, and default arguments.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d4bccdac-8c87-4af7-9f42-7b04dc7244b3","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Internal Logic:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9ee31f4e-927f-4854-87b1-c31599f342c0","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Argument Extraction:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Iterates through the arguments passed to a call.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"af8cd96a-75e6-4e57-be33-d6a7f1f4ac7f","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Resolution:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Decodes the AST nodes for arguments to find out what values or variables are being passed.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4cd8c3e1-2fd9-4319-8bed-b07a7f95d60f","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Mapping:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Returns a list/dictionary structure representing the arguments, which ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"visit_Call","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" then uses to map specific values to the function's definition parameters (e.g., mapping the value ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"10","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to parameter ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5d6ede98-4572-4fef-9315-25b63acf42f1","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
